CustomField.formula: CASE( Approval_Process__c , "New"," New" , "Pending", "Pending" +IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "Pending for Approval", 22, 22), "Approved", "Approved" +IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Approved by Manager", 22, 22), "Rejected", "Rejected"+IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Rejected", 22, 22), "Recalled", "Recalled"+IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "Recalled", 22, 22), "No answer")
CustomField.label: Approval
